Mod.name: Mould
Mod.description:
Mould
An expansion primarily based around hunting and exploration. NOW WITH 100% MORE MOULD!
Incompatible with most other biome mods.
Current Features: New weapons, a 3rd Sun, new bosses, a method to revive bosses, new biomes to fill the empty areas of the map, new materials, Changes to drops, archaeology and world generation changes.
Github: https://github.com/mole-den/mould_n Discord: https://discord.gg/tgdN6kHZhy
Special Thanks: Master of Copium, Gustavo, Extol, Evaisa, TheOneTheOnlySpoopyBoi
